message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper deals with the problem of estimating discrete distributions from data collected in batches, which is a common problem in machine learning and data science. The paper proposes a new polynomial-time estimator that is optimal in the number of batches and achieves the best possible estimation accuracy. This makes it likely that the paper belongs to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), information theory (cs.IT), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and cryptography and security (cs.CR).
